author: valor (Valor_bound)
name: Offend
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this Offend!
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description.
short: Constantly apply emoji to someone's messages!
description: Constantly apply a configurable emoji to someone's messages sent within the guild!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
